NAME: Single choice
DESCRIPTION: Use this type of question to choose one answer from a list.

NAME: Multi choice
DESCRIPTION: Use this type of question to choose one or more answer from a list.

NAME: Rating scale
DESCRIPTION: Use this type of question to rate something.

NAME: Comment
DESCRIPTION: Use this type of question to aquire feedback.

NAME: Reorder items
DESCRIPTION: Use this type of question to reorder items.

NAME: Sum distribution
DESCRIPTION: Use this type of question to disribute weights across several items/options.

NAME: Template
DESCRIPTION: Use this type of question to clone questions from a template.

NAME: Date Input
DESCRIPTION: Use this type of question when the answer to be given is a date or a date/time.
